Actions.Name: Felicity
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 is marked. When marked, and at the start of the storyteller's turn, the marked ally may dash 1.

Combos.Description: An ally in range 4 may dash 4, ignoring all movement penalties and terrain effects.

Actions.Name: Heroism
Actions.Description: The Storyteller gains aura 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 boon on all saves and may save against statuses at the start instead of end of their turn.
